about_the_game:
Fragment of CISCD is a first-person openworld RPG. You will be in CISCD, a school located in the south-west China, originally known as Wencai School playing a student. During your life in the school, you will learn the secrets of your schoolmates and your teachers. You must decide what to do with the things you've discovered. Ultimately, you need to face the secret of yourself.

● Explore the Republic of China styled campus. You have fully access to the school facilities: class rooms, offices, dormitory, dinning hall, cafe. There are items scattered in the campus which you can collect and trigger various additional story or special ability for you.

● Engage in your school life. Go to lessons and examinations, in the mean time, observe what is happening around you.

● Advancing the story. Talk to the NPCs, and decide how to respond and what actions to make. Your choice will affect the storyline direction.
